turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! Is there a starbucks nearby where I can order a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, there is one on Freemansburg Avenue, Easton, PA

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Can you please order my a venti hot cafe latte with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Would you like any sweetener?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like 6 packs of raw sugar in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Would you like anything else in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like some cinnamon powder also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How about whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor would you like in the latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cinnamon dolce flavoring, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So to confirm, one venti hot cafe latte with 6 raw sugars, cinnamon dolce flavoring, 2% milk and cinnamon powder, no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. It will be ready at the starbucks on Freemansburg Ave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate the assistance.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will text you your receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok great! Have a good day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, you too!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Later gator!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Adieu
